dataList.content: Damn, am I glad I got my head screwed back on.
It's a precious sight to watch everyone all freaking out about this child's play.
All the missed news I've been hearing since I opened my eyes in the recovery room sound very enticing. I really wish I was there to watch it all.
Half the family heads getting arrested for treason...
The seat of the Family Hierarch going to some inexperienced kid from the Jia family...
Not to mention how my lovely little sister had her engagement called off, and how she's now been branded as a traitor to her own blood...
All the entertainment in the world seems to have happened during my little nap, don't you think?

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: You didn't even show your face at the regular assembly, so I doubt you've any concern for the future of Hongyuan... so just what are you doing here?
I just thought I'd have some fun!
